attributes.action: Removal of new Bus Gate on St Chads A4400 & Colmore Row in Birmingham
attributes.additional_details: The gates are are creating traffic, and with standing traffic come increases in pollution. The gate is leading traffic to blocking routes to the back of the Children’s Hospital. If they remove the gate, the traffic immediately dissipates. We the citizens of Birmingham, so NOT want our city covered in buss gates!
attributes.background: Get Birmingham City Council to remove the needless bus gates at St Chads A4400 & Colmore Row.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for Birmingham City Council.

You can petition Birmingham City Council directly: https://www.birmingham.gov.uk/info/20146/consultation_and_engagement/702/petitions
